revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Dynamic light | name = White Vavoom light | class = VavoomLightWhite | doomednum = 1502 | game = OpenGL }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:DynamicLight|DynamicLight]]→[[Classes:VavoomLight|VavoomLight]]→VavoomLightWhite
A white light takes only one argument: :''1'': Radius of the light A white light's Z position is absolute, instead of being relative to the floor like all other map objects. All dynamic lights can be toggled on and off with [[Thing_Activate]] and [[Thing_Deactivate]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR VavoomLightWhite : {{Class|VavoomLight}} native {}
